column4: i'm looking at a "minimum requirements" list for a program i want to install.. what's the best way to see if i have them all?
why do you think you should check req for a RSS reader?
i'm an idiot on linux and im trying to build and install something.. i just dont know if the minimum requirements are filled
instead of digging for this consider using Akregator or Lifera Feed Reader
i want to try to build something...   but i have lifera and dont like it
read this carefully.. it should help http://monkeyblog.org/ubuntu/installing/
how do i find out if i have "pybsddb" installed?
no.. the readme says to make sure that's installed.. i just need to know how to figure that out
click system>administration>synaptic package manager> and search for pybsddb
